0.1.name: wordpress/show-all-html-spezial-chars-in-comments
0.1.description: With msHTMLspecialChars can you see all HTML special chars in your comments. And you see the complete comments in your dashbord. When you actived this plugin can you disabled the default comments widget in your dashbord. Bugreport and more informations find your here.
